name: Adorables
description: Great game with the cutest characters you ever imagined
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 120 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 120 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This game is additive.. A fun, easy to play 'sports' game. Plays a bit like a fanciful air hockey with critters rather than pucks. Nice variety. I like the World Tour best so far. Lots of customization, achievements to keep things interesting. All in all a fun little diversion. A surprising thumbs up!  Edit - I have had the game crash a few times in the World Tour mode, not consistently though.  Edit 2 - I've had a few more odd bugs occur, a little annoying at times but usually clear up with a game restart. Also, some of the achievements will take a looooooonnnnng time to get; but I still find the game a good diverson, easy to play a short while and I feel like I will come back to this every so often for a round or two.

Adorable little turn-based sumo game where players select where to shoot their troops at the same time the opponents do. Will require strategy, anticipating the opponent's moves, and only 33MB of hard disk space. One of the best 'mass giveaway' games I've ever played.
Fun little game that is best played at a short time as it doesnt have too much content otherwise from that its enjoyable shooting a little ball around at other balls
